recipe.title: Double-Salmon Dip
ingredients: 4 ounces thinly sliced smoked salmon, cut into 1/2-inch pieces
instructions: Using rubber spatula, mash whipped cream cheese and milk in medium bowl to blend. Fold in salmon and 1 tablespoon chives. Season with pepper to taste. Gently fold in caviar. Cover and refrigerate 2 hours to blend flavors. (Can be made 1 day ahead. Keep refrigerated.) Sprinkle dip with remaining 1 tablespoon chives. Serve dip chilled.
